price: Na wͻka sε: “Kronkron Hene ne Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn! Nokorε sε, Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn bͻhyε bεyε hͻ”.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna sub'ḥāna rabbinā in kāna waʿdu rabbinā lamafʿūlan
